thread.title: Loophole in new tax law could save Apple billions

title: Loophole in new tax law could save Apple billions
text:
Loophole in new tax law could save Apple billions 5:21am EST - 01:50 
An unexpected loophole in a new U.S. tax law could let multinational corporations, such as technology giant Apple, avoid billions of dollars in taxes on profits that they have stashed overseas, according to experts.   
An unexpected loophole in a new U.S. tax law could let multinational corporations, such as technology giant Apple, avoid billions of dollars in taxes on profits that they have stashed overseas, according to experts.  //reut.rs/2D7r6lk
